text: Æthelric is thought to have succeeded his father, Æthelmund, as Ealdorman of Hwicce. In 804 Æthelric issued a charter in which he gave land to his mother, Ceolburh, presumably Æthelmund's widow. ==See also== *Hwicce == External links == * *anglo-saxon.net Category:Anglo-Saxon ealdormen Category:9th-century English people
title: Æthelric son of Æthelmund
